title: LF NZGC team (ADC)
body: Uh mained adc for like 3 seasons, played on a lot of competitive teams like RA. Peaked at 80lp D2 before my keyboard broke :c Just climbing again. I'd prefer to try to get a high position or even win it. Uh ya, I'm on LoL like 24/7 and my schedule is free. Just add me if you wanna talk

replies.body: idk how to. i clicked ur name and went to match history but it just goes to a blank page. alg
also are u a diamond from aus or nz? i live in nz i didnt think thered be much if any diamonds in this country
is there anyway i can watch ur recent games, just for watching purposes?
